'''Mysterious Flyer''' is a quest item received during [[Gorou]]'s [[Hangout Event]], [[Secret Identity]]: The Mysterious Pamphlet.

==Text==
"Teyvat's Big Sister<br />Gentle and kind, she answers all your questions<br />She'll help you be rid of all your troubles!"

==Trivia==
{{Stub|Verify deciphered text}}
* The preview of the pamphlet is written in the [[Inazuman Language]].
* The text is deciphered to read:<br />''TWDNMTVY''<br />''SNCA''<br />''SHN? TNB JYC BYI SDY K''<br />''N?M SUD NRM S''
